channel.title: [317] donator shop help, i wanna know how to change the cost of items
channel.description:
well in my source, items are bought out of a shop with donator points.
in the shop for example it would say.. [code]Spirit Shield: currently costs 2 Donator points[/code]
what file, do i edit the cost of donator points for an item?

item.title: [317] donator shop help, i wanna know how to change the cost of items
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

To editi the file, find the item in Items.cfg
And edidt the first 3 number of the item.
And thats the price.
What it does is, the items in the donator shop are already set to sell and buy with donator points.
So anything in that shop will sell everything it has for donator points.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] donator shop help, i wanna know how to change the cost of items

item.title: [317] donator shop help, i wanna know how to change the cost of items
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

hmm maybe it’s just like regular files-go into items.cgs and it should look something like this

EXAMPLE:
item = 3627 Arcane_spirit_shield An_ethereal_shield_with_an_arcane_sigil_attached_to_it. 120700000 120700000 0 0 0…

so the first number set you see is what the shop will buy fro-the second one is what you sell for-change that and problem solved(maybe) , just not to sure about the donater points but it changes the shop price forsure.

hopefuly that helped =]

Read full topic
